news.title: Google: Ignore Link Spam Ransom Attempts
news.description: According to Google, it is not necessary to address ransom emails that threaten to spam your website with poor quality links and harm your rankings.

news.title: Google Ads Introduces 2 New Ways to Target Users in Google Search
news.description: With the launch of affinity audiences and seasonal event segments for in-market audiences, Google is offering new ways to reach parts of your target market as the holidays approach.
